biotools.summary:
A Python Code for Calculating the Interfacial Properties of Fluids Based on the Square Gradient Theory Using the SAFT-VR Mie Equation of State.

SGTPy is an open-source python package of SAFT-VR-Mie Equation of State (EOS). SGTPy allows to work with pure fluids and fluid mixtures, additionally the fluids can be modeled considering association, cross-association and polar contributions. SGTPy was built on top of phasepy's phase equilibrium and Square Gradient Theory (SGT) functions. These functions were updated to speed-up calculations of associative mixtures.
